and: *taps you with a tendril, which has given you information of what it can build.

Perimeter Walls (Progressive)
Construct flesh walls around the basecamp.

Bio-organic Turrets
Form types of flesh heaps that acts as frontline defenses.

and.no:
Perimeter Walls (Progressive)
Construct flesh walls around the basecamp.

and:
- Using chunks of tainted meat increases build cost by *1.75
- Rotten meat is acceptable
*taps you again, informing you of the perimeter wall's progress, which is

and.no: Each advancement costs 600 meat and takes a day to complete.
and.yes: You no longer need to invest meat, as the perimeter walls has been completed.

and: *taps you again, noting you of available turrets it can build.

*100 meat *150 flesh
> flesh heap
A turret capable of generating/discharging blood acid.

*125 meat *150 flesh
*20 core (blade zombie)
> flesh heap (blade)
A durable turret capable of obliterating enemies at close range.

*75 meat *125 flesh
*20 core (tendril zombie)
> flesh heap (tendril)
A turret specialized for short-ranged crowd-control.

*300 meat *100 flesh
*20 core (mouthswell zombie)
> flesh heap (mouthswell)
An extremely durable turret with concentrated damage.

*150 meat *325 flesh
*20 core (unifier zombie)
> flesh heap (unifier)
A turret capable of forming durable, yet short-lived minions.

and.yes:
*225 meat *250 flesh
*30 core (blade zombie)
*20 core (tendril zombie)
> ravager flesh heap
A hybrid turret with rapid and highly damaging attacks.
